title: I can't connect to Wi-Fi. I just installed Windows 7. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Go on 3dp.com, or google search 3dp.  Download 3dp net from another PC or device. Transfer file to a usb.  Connect USB to new Windows seven PC. Install 3dp net on new PC. Open 3dp net application. Go to WiFi card name listed. Click it. It should open up a download page where you can download the driver. Download wifi driver for windows 7. wait for download.  Install. Restart PC and try to connect to WiFi.  if you don't have access to another computer, use your smart phone or a LAN connection.
Download your wireless drivers from the manufacture site on another computer with internet access.Transfer via USB thumb drive or another method.Install driver.Reboot.Enjoy wireless.
